Uses of Interface
mph.beans.sessions.UserLoginFunctionalities

  • Packages that use UserLoginFunctionalities 
    Package Description
    com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote  
    mph.beans.sessions  

    • Uses of UserLoginFunctionalities in com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote

      Classes in com.raaxxo.mph.sessions.remote that implement UserLoginFunctionalities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdministratorManager
      Stateful session bean implementation of the AdministratorManagerRemote remote interface.
      class  BasicUserManager
      This abstract class provides the reuse of code for the ProfessorManager and StudentManager stateful session bean for all of the common methods implemented by both the managers.
      class  ProfessorManager
      Stateful session bean implementation of the ProfessorManagerRemote remote interface.
      class  StudentManager
      Stateful session bean implementation of the StudentManagerRemote remote interface.
      class  UserSession
      This represent the parent class of each stateful session bean.
      It provides the basic mechanism of logging for all the users, giving some useful information about the session as well.

    • Uses of UserLoginFunctionalities in mph.beans.sessions

      Subinterfaces of UserLoginFunctionalities in mph.beans.sessions 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BasicUserManagerInterface
      This interface will be implemented by the user interfaces to provide the basic user functionalities such as viewing.
      It extends UserSessionInterface, CourseViewerFunctionalities, ProjectViewerFunctionalities, DeliverableViewerFunctionalities, ArtifactViewerFunctionalities, TeamViewerFunctionalities.
      interface  ProfessorManagerRemote
      This remote interface will be implemented by the ProfessorManager classes in the server and client.
      It provides the methods available to professors.

      It extends BasicUserManagerInterface, ProjectEditingFunctionalities, ArtifactEvaluatorFunctionalities.
      interface  StudentManagerRemote
      This remote interface will be implemented by the StudentManager classes in the server and client.
      It provides the methods available to students.

      It extends BasicUserManagerInterface, UserRegisteringFunctionalities, ArtifactEditingFunctionalities, TeamManagementFunctionalities, TeamCreationFunctionalities, TeamBasicFunctionalities.
      interface  UserSessionInterface
      This interface provides methods to manipulate users.
      It extends UserLoginFunctionalities, UserLoginFunctionalities, UserEditingFunctionalities.
